original_text: That night God did what Gideon had asked. The sheep's wool was dry, but the ground around it was wet with dew.
korean_text: 그 밤에 하나님이 그대로 행하시니 곧 양털만 마르고 그 주변 땅에는 다 이슬이 있었더라

sentences.original_text: God did what Gideon had asked
but the ground around it was wet with dew
sentences.korean_translation: 그 주변의 땅은 이슬에 젖어 있었다
